Text:
Install this software, then copy the .dll from the crack folder into alcohol's root directory:
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Alcohol Soft\Alcohol 120" for 64 bit Windows, or:
"C:\Program Files\Alcohol Soft\Alcohol 120" for 32 bit Windows.
Tested and works.
Though I can't say if it's clean or not.
At the very least, Avast 7 didn't report anything.
